title.text: Events are Not Simple: Identity, Non-Identity, and Quasi-Identity

abstractContent.text: 1 Despite considerable theoretical and computational work on coreference, deciding when two entities or events are identical is very difficult.
Ina project to build corpora containing corefer-ence links between events, we have identified three levels of event identity (full, partial, and none).
Event coreference annotation on two corpora was performed to validate the findings.
